text:
Howa...
It's a beautiful day, isn't it, producer-san?

Yeah, I thought I'd go for a walk once in a while,
and the sun would be a nice change of pace.

Howa...
Im, did I look unwell...?

...a little bit, and if you're not feeling well,
let me know right away.

Oh, no, I'm feeling fine,
it's just...
...I'm still not sure I'm ready for this.

I just couldn't help but wonder if it was okay. I've been
causing trouble for Hiori-chan and Meguru-chan...

...I see. So that's why you've been working so hard
on self-practice. Thank you for telling me.

...After hearing that story,
I believe Mano will definitely grow.
You're putting in so much effort.

Yeah, I guarantee it. Believe in yourself...
If that's hard, then believe in my words.

...I want to believe in you, Producer-san.
And... I want to believe in myself too...

So, I'll try to look forward and do my best...
Thank you, Producer-san...
